Ask the user to select one of the the configurations displayed.
Concept.String: Please, select one of the following configurations:

Concept.Comments: Warning message when a generic error occurs pressing the IMAGE button
Concept.String: An error was detected while saving data.

Concept.Comments: Message to user of Add To Report dialog when input string is empty (used also in measure component)
Add to report dialog label (used also in measure component)
Suggested text for vra ratio measure in Add to report dialog the generic long string becomes the title of a section in report, the medium one is used as label in report for the measure value
Section title in Report for the VRA measures added by user to Report
Message on AREA 13 to help the user to use VRA TOOL
Concept.String: Pan image to adjust ROI Center position over the structure to be measured. Press ACTION or START to begin a new measure.

Concept.Comments: Message on AREA 13 to help the user to use VRA TOOL
Concept.String: Adjust ROI size and press ACTION or CALCULATE to begin a new measure.

Concept.Comments: Message on AREA 13 to help the user to use VRA TOOL
Concept.String: Press ACTION or CALCULATE to start automatic measure procedure.

Concept.Comments: Message on AREA 13 to help the user to use VRA TOOL
Concept.String: Draw at least two valid contours and press ACTION or CALCULATE.

Concept.Comments: Message on AREA 13 to help the user to use VRA TOOL
Concept.String: Click to add at least two valid contours, then press ACTION or CALCULATE.

Concept.Comments: Message on AREA 13 to help the user to use VRA TOOL
Concept.String: Add at least two valid contours, then press ACTION or CALCULATE.

Concept.Comments: Message on AREA 13 to help the user to use VRA TOOL
Concept.String: Draw three valid contours and press ACTION or CALCULATE.

Concept.Comments: Message on AREA 13 to help the user to use VRA TOOL
Concept.String: Add three valid contours, then press ACTION or CALCULATE.

Concept.Comments: Message on AREA 13 to help the user to use VRA TOOL
Concept.String: Change current contour and press ACTION or CALCULATE to close measure procedure.

Concept.Comments: Message on AREA 13 to help the user to use VRA TOOL
Concept.String: Change ROI size and press ACTION or CALCULATE to close measure procedure.

Concept.Comments: Message on AREA 13 to help the user to use VRA TOOL
Concept.String: Press MODIFY to change current contour or begin new measure.

Concept.Comments: Message on AREA 13 to help the user to use VRA TOOL
Concept.String: Press MODIFY to change current ROI size or begin new measure.

Concept.Comments: Message on AREA 13 to help the user to use VRA TOOL
Concept.String: Press MODIFY to change current contour or START to begin next measure.

Concept.Comments: Message on AREA 13 to help the user to use VRA TOOL
Concept.String: Volume cannot be calculated. Draw a valid contour and retry.

Concept.Comments: Message on AREA 13 to help the user to use VRA TOOL
Concept.String: Volume cannot be calculated. Draw at least two valid contours and retry.
